name: Easy Artichoke Appetizer
author: CAREYBUG
summary: If you love hot artichoke dip, you'll love this. It's easy to make and requires no crackers. It's the perfect finger food for get-togethers. They can be cut into triangles, rectangles , or any shape you like.  Serve warm if possible. Just bake, cut, and serve!
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
½ cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Unroll crescent roll dough into rectangles; press into the bottom and sides of a 15x10x1-inch jelly roll pan or baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, about 10 minutes
Combine artichoke hearts, Parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, creamy salad dressing, and garlic powder in a bowl until well mixed
Spread creamy artichoke mixture over the browned crust
Return to oven and bake until cheese is melted and beginning to brown, about 15 minutes
Cut into desired shapes and serve
